title: All BANG, little buck: Need-related experiences are weakly linked with behavior in the video game domain

creators.name: Ballou, Nick
creators.affiliation: Imperial College London, Dyson School of Design Engineering

creators.name: Földes, Tamás Andrei
creators.affiliation: University of Oxford, Oxford Internet Institute

creators.name: Vuorre, Matti
creators.affiliation: Tilburg University, Department of Social Psychology

creators.name: Hakman, Thomas
creators.affiliation: University of Oxford, Oxford Internet Institute

creators.name: Przybylski, Andrew K
creators.affiliation: University of Oxford, Oxford Internet Institute

description:
Code and materials for 'All BANG, little buck: Need-related experiences are weakly linked with behavior in the video game domain.'

Contents:
- Reproducible Quarto manuscript with all analyses
- R code for multilevel within-between models, multiple imputation, and visualizations
- Helper functions for processing multi-platform digital trace data

Data: This repository analyzes data from the Open Play dataset (https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17536656), which contains 30 days of daily diary surveys and digital trace data from 555 U.S. players across Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and Steam.

A browser-readable version of the manuscript is available at https://nballou.github.io/basic-needs-in-games/
